attributes.action: Strictly Enforce Article 15 of the Human Rights Act which prohibits discrimination.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make every taxpayer equal under the law. Article 15 HRA prohibits discrimination yet certain people e.g. MPs and heads of quangos get many perks & benefits such as pension rights, job security beyond retirement age, tax free allowances,free travel etc which is denied to the remainder of the tax paying public.  E. Lindsay
